The worm burrowed and got moving. He started thinking to hinself that 
Shadow Star was just the kind of guy who liked to hear themselves 
talk. The kinda scraphole he definitely didn't like.

Burrock: Oh sorry, mighty one, for being such an imbecile!

He located the spot quite easily, and, as he dug up, found himself in 
a thick mud.

Burrock: Ah slaggin' pieces of junkeon! What in the world is this 
place?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> SS:  I meant go to that other base he's at and help
> him you idiot.
> 
> SS (mental note):  That's it he's out of my new
> universal order.
> 
> He fired one last time and flew off towards the
> Predicon base.
> 
> --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Burrock transformed and dug underground, avoiding
> > some of the gun 
> > shots. He started moving slowly so SS wouldn't get
> > left behind.
> > 
> > Burrock: Yeah, Tyrael... Contact him if ya want, I
> > don't know his 
> > private frequency anyways... maybe better this way
> > too.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> > wrote:
> > > SS fired at the base again.
> > > 
> > > SS:  Fine we'll meet with Tyreal.
> > > 
> > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > After a while, Burrock started getting bored.
> > > > Shooting at autoguns and 
> > > > dodging wasn't especially challenging.
> > > > 
> > > > Burrock: Hey SS, I'm getting bored over here.
> > Think
> > > > we should go until 
> > > > someone's here?
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure"
> > > > <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Combined with the shots of both attackers, the
> > > > shields weakened even 
> > > > > more and an autogun exploded. It had time to
> > fire,
> > > > though, and it 
> > > > hit 
> > > > > Burrock in the torso, disintegrating some
> > armor.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Burrock: Here goes one o' them! Tell me when
> > ya
> > > > tired, Leather! 
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
> > > > <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > SS gets shot in the wing and starts to nose
> > > > dive, but
> > > > > > barely manages to pull up and returns fire.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...>
> > wrote:
> > > > > > > The base's autoguns continued firing on
> > both
> > > > > > > intruders. The 
> > > > > > > defensive computer sent a general maximal
> > > > alert,
> > > > > > > indicating that 
> > > > > > > the ship was under attack.Shadow Star's
> > fire
> > > > > > > penetrated a little and 
> > > > > > > heated the surface of the base.
> > > > > > > This time, Burrock managed to dodge all
> > shots
> > > > > > > directed at him. He 
> > > > > > > opened fire with his spikes, this time
> > coating
> > > > them
> > > > > > > with acid. Some of 
> > > > > > > the shots went through and started to
> > slowly
> > > > corrode
> > > > > > > the armor, but 
> > > > > > > most didn't
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Burrock: That's it! We'll take them out
> > > > slowly, but
> > > > > > > we will!
> > > > > > >

> > > > <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > > > > > wrote:

> > to
> > > > avoid

> > > > > > > > shot and breathed fire on it again.
> > > > > > > >

> > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > > OOC: I'll post for the base.
> > > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > > Burrock fired again with his spikes,
> > and
> > > > lashed
> > > > > > > at
> > > > > > > > > the shields with 
> > > > > > > > > his tendrils. At this time, they
> > weakened
> > > > and
> > > > > > > could
> > > > > > > > > only stop half of 
> > > > > > > > > the shots they received. At that
> > moment,
> > > > the
> > > > > > > > > autoguns came alive and 
> > > > > > > > > two of them targeted Burrock, while
> > one
> > > > directed
> > > > > > > > > itself towards Shadow 
> > > > > > > > > Star. Moving to avoid the shots, the
> > > > Worm-bot
> > > > > > > got
> > > > > > > > > wounded to his right 
> > > > > > > > > leg and one of his tendrils.
> > > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > > Burrock: Stupid freaking
> > autodefenses!!! I
> > > > don't
> > > > > > > > > care what the boss 
> > > > > > > > > wnated to do, but I'm gonna scrap
> > their
> > > > sentry
> > > > > > > guns
> > > > > > > > > right away!
> > > > > > > > >

> > > > > > > Maximals,
